time, oh my weapon! I long for you in my struggle! Speak and say I am awake, Oh war it has been a long time. ğ„‡ ğ„† It has been a long time for the soldiers, Advancing with thunderous roar, ğ„‡ Swearing never to return, Except with epoch-making victory. ğ„† Rise and close ranks, With lives ready for sacrifice. ğ„‡ O! the horror that the enemy shall suffer, From you in the fire of the battlefield. It has been a long time, oh my weapon! I long for you in my struggle! Speak and say I am awake, Oh war it has been a long time. ğ„† O! glory our glory, You who was built by us, ğ„‡ ğ„† By toil and pain, ğ„‡ Never to go to waste. ğ„† Rise and close ranks, With lives ready for sacrifice. ğ„‡ O! the horror that the enemy shall suffer, From you in the fire of the battlefield. It has been a long time, oh my weapon! I long for you in my struggle! Speak and say I am awake, Oh war it has been a long time. ğ„† Who shall protect Free Egypt? We shall protect her with our weapons. Land of the Revolution, who will sacrifice for her sake? We will, with our souls. ğ„‡ ğ„† The people advance like the light, The people stand like mountains and seas, Volcanoes of anger, volcanoes erupting, Earthquakes digging the enemy into their graves. ğ„‡ ğ„† It has been a long time, oh my weapon! I long for you in my struggle! Speak and say I am awake, Oh war it has been a long time. ğ„‡ ğ„† Oh! Per anni! la mia arma! Ti desidero nella mia lotta!
